definitions.definition: Finely ground or pulverized tobacco (or other plant derivative) intended for use by being sniffed or snorted into the nose.
Fine-ground or minced tobacco, dry or moistened , intended for use by placing a pinch behind the lip or beneath the tongue .
A snort or sniff of fine-ground, powdered, or pulverized tobacco.
The act of briskly inhaling by the nose; a sniff, a snort .
Resentment or skepticism expressed by quickly drawing air through the nose; snuffling ; sniffling .

main_definition: Finely ground or pulverized tobacco (or other plant derivative) intended for use by being sniffed or snorted into the nose.
secondary_definitions: Fine-ground or minced tobacco, dry or moistened , intended for use by placing a pinch behind the lip or beneath the tongue .
A snort or sniff of fine-ground, powdered, or pulverized tobacco.
The act of briskly inhaling by the nose; a sniff, a snort .
Resentment or skepticism expressed by quickly drawing air through the nose; snuffling ; sniffling .

definitions.definition: The burning part of a candle wick , or the black, burnt remains of a wick (which must be periodically removed).
Leavings in a glass after drinking; heeltaps .
A film or video clip which involves a real non-acted murder.

main_definition: The burning part of a candle wick , or the black, burnt remains of a wick (which must be periodically removed).
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) Leavings in a glass after drinking; heeltaps .
( attributive , slang ) A film or video clip which involves a real non-acted murder.
